title: Cheapest Flights Within K Stops
content:
There are  cities connected by  flights. Each flight starts from city  and arrives at  with a price .
Now given all the cities and flights, together with starting city  and the destination , your task is to find the cheapest price from  to  with up to  stops. If there is no such route, output .


 


The number of nodes  will be in range , with nodes labeled from 0 to .
The size of  will be in range .
The format of each flight will be .
The price of each flight will be in the range .
 is in the range of .
There will not be any duplicated flights or self cycles.
